text:
While I find the option of upgrading very appealing, in my case it probably
won't work. I have a physical box running 2012 R2 Essentials, the OEM type, not
the add-on role. I've added on a second DC running 2022 so now need to upgrade
the 2012 R2 box (hardware may be several years old but it in great shape). I'm
guessing upgrading an OEM Essentials install probably won't work. Any thoughts
on that anyone?
%40googlegroups.com

metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] Extended Security Updates for Server 2012R2
metadata.email_text_original:
You don't often get email from jpleslie01@hotmail.com. Learn why this is
important [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification]
